li.label: Blazing Might
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} harnesses the fury of an unrelenting inferno, striking with the scorching power of flames. {PAWN_pronoun}'s attacks burn through defenses, embodying the essence of destruction.

li.label: Infernal Dash
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} moves with the speed of a wildfire, blazing across the battlefield before enemies can react. {PAWN_pronoun} strikes with precision, leaving only embers in {PAWN_possessive} wake.

li.label: Infernal Command
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} radiates the presence of a roaring blaze, drawing even the fiercest creatures to {PAWN_possessive} command. {PAWN_pronoun} bends the will of beasts with the unwavering force of fire.

li.label: Burning Will
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} endures hardship like tempered steel in the forge, standing firm against pain and exhaustion. Even when all seems lost, {PAWN_pronoun} fights on, burning with indomitable resolve.

li.label: Infernal Resistance
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} thrives in the heart of the fire, unshaken by toxins and filth. {PAWN_pronoun} emerges from even the harshest conditions, unburnt and unwavering.

li.label: Ember Chef
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} wields fire as both a weapon and a tool, expertly crafting meals infused with the essence of flame. {PAWN_pronoun} ensures that nothing goes to waste, sustaining all who fight beside {PAWN_pronoun}.

li.label: Blazing Charisma
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} burns with an undeniable presence, drawing others in like moths to a flame. {PAWN_pronoun}'s spirit ignites passion and loyalty in those who stand by {PAWN_pronoun}.

li.label: Fiery Compassion
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} treats the wounded with the warmth of a nurturing flame, ensuring swift recovery. {PAWN_pronoun} wields both destruction and healing, never allowing an ally to fall to the cold grasp of death.

li.label: Infernal Growth
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} understands the cycle of destruction and rebirth, nurturing the land like volcanic soil. Wherever {PAWN_pronoun} treads, new life rises from the ashes.
